title: Shamokin Shammies
text: The Shamokin Shammies played <a href="baseball">baseball</a> in the <a href="New%20York-Pennsylvania%20League%20%28early%2020th%20century%29">first New York-Pennsylvania League</a> in 1925, going 54-77, last in the eight team league. They were formed when the <a href="Oneonta%20Indians">Oneonta Indians</a> relocated to <a href="Shamokin%2C%20Pennsylvania">Shamokin, Pennsylvania</a> after the 1924 season. The team changed its name to the Shamokin Indians for the 1926 and 1927 seasons.
